entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
